attributes.action: Bring down the cost of energy in line with wholesale prices.
attributes.background: Either implement a real wealth tax on the energy companies or lower the price cap to a price inline with the price of wholesale gas. They are are at lower levels that in 2021 however our prices are going up. This geed needs to be stopped.

rejection.details:
The cap on energy prices is set by Ofgem, which is operationally independent of the Government and Parliament, but we have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Remove the link between electricity prices and the price of gas: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/621874

Reinstate the two year energy price guarantee: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/625700

Subsidise energy and fuel prices to mitigate cost increases: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/622530
